DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy erythropoietin refractory autoimmune encephalitis . Ten patient receive 100 IU/kg erythropoietin 3 time week 12 week .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Erythropoietin Refractory Autoimmune Encephalitis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: Erythropoietin improve refractory autoimmune encephalitis . Erythropoietin tissue-protective effect via activation Janus kinase ( JAK ) -2 , signal transducer activator transcription ( STAT ) -5 pathway NF-kappa B pathway . The activation JAK-2 STAT-5 promote hemoglobin synthesis facilitate cell cycle progression . Also , NF-kappa B pathway inhibition regulate pro-inflammatory cytokine production . We expect erythropoietin may lead improve symptom outcome autoimmune encephalitis .
